005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
011
012import java.math.BigInteger;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016public interface IIntegerItem extends IDecimalItem {
017
018  @SuppressWarnings("null")
019  @NonNull
020  IIntegerItem ONE = valueOf(BigInteger.ONE);
021  @SuppressWarnings("null")
022  @NonNull
023  IIntegerItem ZERO = valueOf(BigInteger.ZERO);
024  @SuppressWarnings("null")
025  @NonNull
026  IIntegerItem NEGATIVE_ONE = valueOf(BigInteger.ONE.negate());
027
028  /**
029   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
030   *
031   * @param value
032   *          a string representing an integer value
033   * @return the item
034   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
035   *           if the provided value is not an integer
036   */
037  @NonNull
038  static IIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
039    try {
040      return valueOf(new BigInteger(value));
041    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
042      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(null,
043          ex.getMessage(),
044          ex);
045    }
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Construct a new integer item using the provided {@code value}.
050   *
051   * @param value
052   *          a long value
053   * @return the new item
054   */
055  @NonNull
056  static IIntegerItem valueOf(int value) {
057    @SuppressWarnings("null")
058    @NonNull
059    BigInteger bigInteger = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
060    return valueOf(bigInteger);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Construct a new integer item using the provided {@code value}.
065   *
066   * @param value
067   *          a long value
068   * @return the new item
069   */
070  @NonNull
071  static IIntegerItem valueOf(long value) {
072    @SuppressWarnings("null")
073    @NonNull
074    BigInteger bigInteger = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
075    return valueOf(bigInteger);
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Construct a new integer item using the provided {@code value}.
080   *
081   * @param value
082   *          an integer value
083   * @return the new item
084   */
085  @NonNull
086  static IIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
087    int signum = value.signum();
088
089    IIntegerItem retval;
090    if (signum == -1) { // negative
091      retval = new IntegerItemImpl(value);
092    } else if (signum == 0) { // zero
093      retval = INonNegativeIntegerItem.valueOf(value);
094    } else { // positive
095      retval = IPositiveIntegerItem.valueOf(value);
096    }
097    return retval;
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
102   *
103   * @param item
104   *          the item to cast
105   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
106   *         cast to this type
107   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
108   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
109   */
110  @NonNull
111  static IIntegerItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
112    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.INTEGER.cast(item);
113  }
114
115  @Override
116  IIntegerItem abs();
117
118  @Override
119  default IIntegerItem ceiling() {
120    return this;
121  }
122
123  @Override
124  default IIntegerItem floor() {
125    return this;
126  }
127
128  @Override
129  default IIntegerItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
130    return valueOf(cast(item).asInteger());
131  }
132
133  @Override
134  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
135    return compareTo(cast(item));
136  }
137
138  /**
139   * Compares this value with the argument.
140   *
141   * @param item
142   *          the item to compare with this value
143   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
144   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
145   */
146  default int compareTo(IIntegerItem item) {
147    return asInteger().compareTo(item.asInteger());
148  }
149}
